subject: Basketball (College)
Deafness
lead_paragraph: Geoff Herbert, a Syracuse supporter who is deaf, has attracted a large Twitter following by scrutinizing the hot-tempered Jim Boeheim and trying to reproduce what he says.
snippet: Geoff Herbert, a Syracuse supporter who is deaf, has attracted a large Twitter following by scrutinizing the hot-tempered Jim Boeheim and trying to reproduce what he says.
